http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imsmd_loose_v1p3p2.xsd"       orderSignificant="false"       language="en-US">     <vocabName>         <langstring language="en-US">IMS Global QTI Glossary of Terms for Usage Data Item Statistics</langstring>     </vocabName>     <vocabIdentifier isRegistered="true">http://www.imsglobal.org/qti/qtiv2p1/itemstatisticsglossaryv1p0</vocabIdentifier>     <term>         <termIdentifier>A-Param</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">IRT a parameter</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Index of item discrimination based on item response theory.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, A-Param, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>AIS</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Average Item Score</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">A group-dependent measure of item difficulty. Equal to the mean of the item  scores for a group of individuals. For a rights-only dichotomously scored test,  equivalent to the percent answering the item correctly (P-value).</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Distractor Statistics, AIS, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>B-Param</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">IRT b parameter</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Index of item difficulty based on item response theory.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, B-Param, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>C-Param</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">IRT c parameter</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">The lower asymptote of the item response function. Generally an index of  guessing i.e. the probability of getting the item correct for very low ability  examinees.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, C-Param, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>D-Param</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">IRT d parameter</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">A measure of the dispersion of the item computed using the IRT method.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, D-Param, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Fifths_Table_Highest</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Fifths_Table_Highest</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Count of examinees in the highest fifth of the test score distribution  who selected the specified option.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Fifths_Table_Highest, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Fifths_Table_Lowest</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Fifths_Table_Lowest</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Count of examinees in the lowest fifth of the test score distribution  who selected the specified option.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Fifths_Table_Lowest, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Fifths_Table_Middle</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Fifths_Table_Middle</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Count of examinees in the middle fifth of the test score distribution  who selected the specified option.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Fifths_Table_Middle, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Fifths_Table_Second_Highest</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Fifths_Table_Second_Highest</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Count of examinees in the second highest fifth of the test score distribution  who selected the specified option.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Fifths_Table_Second_Highest, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Fifths_Table_Second_Lowest</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Fifths_Table_Second_Lowest</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Count of examinees in the second lowest fifth of the test score distribution  who selected the specified option.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Fifths_Table_Second_Lowest, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>P-value</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">P-value</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">A group-dependent measure of item difficulty. It is equal to the percent  answering the item correctly.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, P-value, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>PHI</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Phi coefficient</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">A group-dependent measure of item discrimination, Phi is the correlation of  two dichotomous variables. In item analysis, it is generally the correlation  between getting an item right or wrong and some dichotomous variable e.g.  pass, fail.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, PHI, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>PTbis</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">r-pointbiserial</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">A group-dependent measure of item discrimination, r-pointbiserial is the point  biserial correlation between the score on a dichotomous item and a criterion  which is a variable that can take many possible values, such as total score on  the test. </langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, PTbis, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Polyserial</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Polyserial</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">The polyserial correlation is the generalization of the biserial correlation  for use with either dichotomous or polytomous items. For example, it  may be the generalized form of the correlation with a criterion. It is  the correlation of the item score with some continuous variable,  usually the total score on the test.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Polyserial, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>Score_Conversion</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">Score Conversion Table</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">Raw scores and their corresponding converted values e.g. the values  to be used in score reports.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, Score_Conversion, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <term>         <termIdentifier>rbis</termIdentifier>         <caption>             <langstring language="en-US">r-biserial</langstring>         </caption>         <description>             <langstring language="en-US">A group-dependent measure of item discrimination, r-biserial is an estimate  of the biserial correlation between a latent continuous variable hypothesised  to underlie performance on a dichotomous item (i.e. item score) and a criterion  which is a variable that can take many possible vales, such as total score on the  test.</langstring>         </description>         <metadata>             <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">                 <general>                     <keyword>                         <string>Item Statistics, rbis, IMS Global QTIv2.1</string>                     </keyword>                 </general>                 <relation>                     <resource>                         <description>                             <string>IMS Global</string>                         </description>                     </resource>                 </relation>                 <lifeCycle>                     <contribute>                         <role>                             <value>publisher</value>                         </role>                         <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                         <date>                             <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                         </date>                     </contribute>                     <status>                         <value>Final</value>                     </status>                 </lifeCycle>             </lom>         </metadata>     </term>     <metadata>         <lom xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">             <general>                 <title>                     <string>IMS Global QTI Glossary of Terms for Usage Data Item Statistics</string>                 </title>                 <keyword>                     <string>QTIv2.1, Usage Data, Item Statistics Glossary</string>                 </keyword>                 <language>en-US</language>                 <description>                     <string>Description: The set of terms that would be used to collect the item statistics. This is the value that will be entered in the 'name' element.</string>                     <string>History: Version 1.0: The first formal release of this QTI Glossary.</string>                 </description>             </general>             <lifeCycle>                 <contribute>                     <role>                         <value>author</value>                     </role>                     <entity>Colin Smythe, IMS Global (UK)</entity>                 </contribute>                 <version>                     <string>1.0</string>                 </version>                 <status>                     <value>Final Release</value>                 </status>                 <contribute>                     <role>                         <value>publisher</value>                     </role>                     <entity>IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</entity>                     <date>                         <dateTime>2013-01-07</dateTime>                     </date>                 </contribute>             </lifeCycle>             <rights>                 <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>                     <value>yes</value>                 </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>                 <description>                     <string>2012 (c) IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.</string>                 </description>             </rights>             <technical>                 <format>XML</format>             </technical>         </lom>     </metadata> </vdex>
